message: I’d like to start meditating more regularly. I feel stressed lately.
Good call – meditation can really help. Want to aim for 3 sessions this week, 10 minutes each?
Great! Want me to remind you in the evenings or mornings?
Got it. Let’s try for your first session tonight after 8 PM.
Hey, how are you feeling tonight? Ready for a short meditation session?
Just checking in. Haven’t heard from you – everything okay? Remember, it’s okay to restart anytime.
